name: You Have Two Seconds
description:
WARNING!

Your space station has experienced a critical malfunction. The entire station is rapidly losing structural stability.

~~~

On a collapsing space station, you must guide a small astronaut through a series of challenging platformer levels to safety. But be careful, and be quick! Each room will only stay stable for 2 seconds. Can you complete all 25 bite-sized challenges?

This game was made for the United Game Jam 2020. The theme is TWO, and so this is a platformer where all levels must be completed in two seconds. I am a beginner, working solo, with all art, code, and sound created by me. 

Fonts used: Nasalization by Typodermic Fonts (https://www.dafont.com/nasalization.font)

I hope you enjoy the game! Good Luck!
